ANIMATION

This is a demonstration of jsPlumb's 'animate' method.

Drag orange dots to create connections.

Click on or near blue dots to make them move in that direction.

add a disc

remove all connections

This demonstration uses jsPlumb 1.5.2, MooTools 1.3.2 and MooTools More 1.3.2.1.
